pr_title: TRUNK-5942 Adding curly braces to Control structures

timeline.bodyText: Thanks @miirochristopher for working on this, could you remove some spaces, Also try to  do identation
timeline.author: sherrif10

timeline.bodyText: For readability in Java, the brace "{" is on the same line as the previous line of code. If some people write on the same line, the other part in the new line, the code will become less readable.
timeline.author: sacull
sacull
